page.title: 20City of Swansea
page.content: Swansea is the{second city of Wales}in both area and population. You will hear{more Welsh spoken}on Swansea streets than you will in Cardiff, the capital city. {Diolch am y cyfle i gymeryd ran yn y {Cynllun}(Thank you for the chance to take part in the project) Contributers from{8}schools --------------------------- Kim Gilbert Helen Davies Kimberely Jones Yvonne Hughes Paul Button Leighton Evans Jason Hopkins Richard Mugford Darren Pullin Simon Grigg ********** Richard Gibbins Allison Pullen Natalie Crook Darren Jones
